jobprofile: Happy Sabbath saints and welcome to Newlife church. God, in His wisdom have blessed us with wonderful children who together with us are potential candidates of the kingdom of God.

Teaching them to love God should be the highest priority for all parents, that is, after providing for their most basic needs of food and shelter. While caring for the physical, intellectual, and emotional needs of children is extremely important, even more significant is their spiritual health. Every other aspect of a child's experience is dependent on their moral and spiritual condition. (Proverbs 22:6, Deuteronomy 6:5-7)

“The children are to be trained to become missionaries; they must be helped to understand distinctly what they must do to be saved.” {Counsels to Parents, Teachers, and Students, page 168}. And the best preparation “is the harmonious development of the physical, the mental, and the spiritual powers. It prepares the student for the joy of service in this world and for the higher joy of wider service in the world to come.” {Education, page 13}.
God help us to bring up our in His light.
